Docs.summary: Gets or sets the controller for the Surface Dial. The can be set from your app logic in case you use Surface Dial in other custom cases than on a . This helper class will do everything for you, but if you want to control the Menu Items and/or wish to use the same Surface Dial instance This is the property for the static controller so you can access it if needed.
